DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 40 yearsold inclusive . Education level : least secondary . Righthanded ( Edinburgh Handedness Inventory ) . The subject good health basis medical interview ( medical history , symptom ) , physical examination vital sign . No history psychiatric disorder ( assess Structured Clinical Interview DSM IV Disorders ( SCID ) Barcelona Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) Marseille ) . Subject without history brain disease ( severe brain trauma , stroke , cerebral tumor ... ) . Subject without lesion MRI . Subject without abnormal electrical activity standard clinical EEG .
